externalfield.help: Field given in x y z components

ecp.help: Effective Core Potentials for DFT Calculations

functional.help: Exchange correlation functional used. You can also specify an exchange and a correlation functional

dipole_spacing.help: Spacing for splitting multipoles into charges

temporary_file.help: Filename for temporary files without extension

convergence_tightness.help: How accurate the dft self-consistency has to be

cleanup.help: files to remove after the calculation. Specify the fileextensions

orca.help: orca specific keywords can be added here, where the xml tag corresponds to the option and the value to the option's value

xtpdft.help: xtpdft specific keywords can be added here

use_external_density.help: whether or not to use a precomputed external density

fock_matrix_reset.help: how often the fock matrix is reset

energy.help: DeltaE at which calculation is converged

method.help: Main method to use for convergence accelertation

DIIS_start.help: DIIS error at which DIIS takes over

ADIIS_start.help: DIIS error at which ADIIS takes over

DIIS_length.help: old hamiltonians to keep in history

DIIS_maxout.help: if true remove the maximum element in the history if DIIS_length is exceeded.Otherwise, the oldest element is removed.

levelshift_end.help: DIIS error at levelshifting is disabled

mixing.help: mixing parameter for linear mixing of density matrices

initial_guess.help: Method to use to make initial guess, independent(electrons) or atom(densities)
